title: Workshop on Practical Module Design for Biomedical Engineering Education Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Biomechanical foundational theories and basic principles of instructional design
context.additional_context: Strengthening Capabilities for Developing and Operating Practical Modules in Biomedical Engineering for Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers

learning_goals: Design practice-oriented educational modules incorporating the latest trends in biomedical engineering.
Collaboratively produce practical content related to medical device development and tissue engineering through team-based collaboration.
Apply teaching-learning strategies for core biomedical engineering concepts in learner-engaged environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
